When to use Locative:: Used to indicate location or context. It always occurs after specific prepositions and cannot stand alone

T - > C

When to use Locative::
After the following prepositions:
- Przy (During / At / Next to) ---- unique to locative
- W (In / At)
- Na (On / At)
- Po (After / Over the surface of)
- O (About)
